Reviews.Title: Great images, but very, very fragile connections
Reviews.Author: dep
Reviews.Content: I'm glad I got the system however I really think that they must have rushed the product to market. The camera control connection is actually not fastened to the back of the DVR panel except by two very thin and exposed wires. For a unit of this cost, they should have made a sturdy connection system. On the brighter side, the camera and pictures are awesome.

ProductInfo.Name: Swann Professional HD Surveillance System 4 x Cam
